mapper.select: select * from emr_home_page ehp where ehp.pk_pv=#{pkPv} and ehp.del_flag='0'
select * from emr_home_page_ops op where op.pk_page=#{pkPage} and op.del_flag='0'
select * from emr_home_page_charges cg where cg.pk_page=#{pkPage} and cg.del_flag='0'
select * from emr_home_page_br br where br.pk_page=#{pkPage} and br.del_flag='0'
select * from emr_home_page_or pr where pr.pk_page=#{pkPage} and pr.del_flag='0'
select * from emr_home_page_or_dt dt where dt.pk_pageor=#{pkPageOr} and dt.del_flag='0'
select * from emr_home_page_trans trans where trans.pk_page = #{pkPage} and trans.del_flag = '0'

select pv.pk_pv, pv.pk_pi, ip.ip_times times, org.code_hosp med_org_code, org.name_org med_org_name, case when pi.hic_no is null then pi.insur_no else pi.hic_no end health_card_no, paymode.code med_pay_mode, pi.code_ip pat_no, pi.name_pi name, pi.dt_sex, pi.birth_date, br.weight newborn_weight, inf.weight newborn_in_weight, pi.addr_birth, pi.addrcode_birth, pi.addr_origin, pi.addrcode_origin origin_addr_code, country.ba_code country_code, country.name country_name, nation.ba_code nation_code, nation.name nation_name, pi.dt_idtype id_type, pi.id_no, occup.ba_code occup_code, occup.name occup_name, marry.ba_code marry_code, marry.name marry_name, pi.addr_cur curr_addr, pi.addr_cur_dt curr_addr_dt, pi.addrcode_cur curr_addr_code, pi.postcode_cur curr_zip_code, pi.unit_work work_unit, --工作单位 pi.tel_work work_unit_phone, --单位电话 pi.postcode_work work_unit_zip_code, --单位邮编
pi.addr_regi reside_addr, pi.addr_regi_dt reside_addr_dt, pi.addrcode_regi reside_addr_code, pi.postcode_regi reside_zip_code,--户籍地址邮编 pi.mobile curr_phone, pv.name_rel contact_name, ln.ba_code admit_path_code, ln.name admit_path_name, rel.ba_code contact_relat_code, rel.name contact_relat_name, pv.addr_rel contact_addr, pv.tel_rel contact_phone, pv.date_admit admit_time, adm.code_dept pk_admit_dept, adm.name_dept admit_dept_name, adw.code_dept pk_admit_ward, adw.name_dept admit_ward_name, pv.date_end dis_time, dis.code_dept pk_dept_dis, dis.name_dept dis_dept_name, diw.code_dept pk_ward_dis, diw.name_dept dis_ward_name, ip.name_diag diag_name_clinic, ip.code_diag diag_code_clinic, pv.pk_emp_tre pk_emp_clinic, pv.name_emp_tre clinic_name, case when cp.eu_rectype = '1' then '1' else '2' end flag_cp, abo.ba_code blood_code_abo, abo.name blood_name_abo, rh.ba_code blood_code_rh, rh.name blood_name_rh, dire.pk_emp pk_emp_director, dire.name_emp director_name, cons.pk_emp pk_emp_consult, cons.name_emp consult_name, refe.pk_emp pk_emp_refer, refe.name_emp refer_name, ns.pk_emp pk_emp_nurse, ns.name_emp nurse_name, lear.pk_emp pk_emp_learn, lear.name_emp learn_name, inte.pk_emp pk_emp_intern, inte.name_emp intern_name, qcd.pk_emp pk_emp_qc_doc, qcd.name_emp qc_doc_name, lv.ba_code leave_hos_code, lv.name leave_hos_name, case when pv.flag_settle='1' then settle.amt else (select sum(cg.amount) from bl_ip_dt cg where cg.pk_pv=pv.pk_pv) end total_cost, settle.amt_pi self_cost from pv_encounter pv inner join pi_master pi on pv.pk_pi = pi.pk_pi inner join pv_ip ip on pv.pk_pv = ip.pk_pv left outer join pv_infant inf on pv.pk_pv = inf.pk_pv_infant --新生儿入院 left outer join pv_infant br on pv.pk_pv = br.pk_pv and br.sort_no = 1 --产科 inner join bd_ou_dept adm on ip.pk_dept_admit = adm.pk_dept inner join bd_ou_dept adw on ip.pk_dept_ns_admit = adw.pk_dept left outer join bd_ou_dept dis on ip.pk_dept_dis = dis.pk_dept left outer join bd_ou_dept diw on ip.pk_dept_ns_dis = diw.pk_dept inner join bd_ou_org org on pv.pk_org = org.pk_org inner join bd_hp hp on pv.pk_insu = hp.pk_hp inner join bd_defdoc paymode on hp.dt_mdpaytype = paymode.code and paymode.code_defdoclist = '040009' left outer join bd_defdoc country on pi.dt_country = country.code and country.code_defdoclist = '000009' left outer join bd_defdoc nation on pi.dt_nation = nation.code and nation.code_defdoclist = '000003' left outer join bd_defdoc occup on pi.dt_occu = occup.code and occup.code_defdoclist = '000010' left outer join bd_defdoc marry on pi.dt_marry = marry.code and marry.code_defdoclist = '000006' left outer join bd_defdoc rel on pv.dt_ralation = rel.code and rel.code_defdoclist = '000013' left outer join cp_rec cp on pv.pk_pv = cp.pk_pv and cp.eu_status = '8' left outer join bd_defdoc abo on pi.dt_blood_abo = abo.code and abo.code_defdoclist = '000004' left outer join bd_defdoc rh on pi.dt_blood_rh = rh.code and rh.code_defdoclist = '000005' left outer join pv_staff dire on pv.pk_pv = dire.pk_pv and dire.dt_role = '0000' and (pv.date_end=dire.date_end or dire.date_end is null) --主任 left outer join pv_staff cons on pv.pk_pv = cons.pk_pv and cons.dt_role = '0006' and (pv.date_end=cons.date_end or cons.date_end is null) --主治 left outer join pv_staff refe on pv.pk_pv = refe.pk_pv and refe.dt_role = '0001' and (pv.date_end=refe.date_end or refe.date_end is null) --住院 left outer join pv_staff ns on pv.pk_pv = ns.pk_pv and ns.dt_role = '0100' and (pv.date_end=ns.date_end or ns.date_end is null) --责护 left outer join pv_staff lear on pv.pk_pv = lear.pk_pv and lear.dt_role = '0003' and (pv.date_end=lear.date_end or lear.date_end is null) --进修 left outer join pv_staff inte on pv.pk_pv = inte.pk_pv and inte.dt_role = '0004' and (pv.date_end=inte.date_end or inte.date_end is null) --实习 left outer join pv_staff qcd on pv.pk_pv = qcd.pk_pv and qcd.dt_role = '0005' and (pv.date_end=qcd.date_end or qcd.date_end is null) --质控 left outer join bd_defdoc lv on ip.dt_outtype = lv.code and lv.code_defdoclist = '000105' left outer join bd_defdoc ln on ip.dt_intype=ln.code and ln.code_defdoclist='000104' left outer join (select sum(st.amount_st) amt, sum(st.amount_pi) amt_pi, st.pk_pv from bl_settle st where st.pk_pv = #{pkPv} group by st.pk_pv) settle on pv.pk_pv = settle.pk_pv where pv.pk_pv = #{pkPv}

select adt.pk_dept, dept.code_dept, dept.name_dept, adt.date_begin trans_date, case when dept.dt_medicaltype like '21%' then '1' else '0' end flag_icu, medtype.ba_code code_icutype, medtype.name name_icutype, adt.date_end from pv_adt adt inner join bd_ou_dept dept on adt.pk_dept = dept.pk_dept inner join bd_defdoc medtype on dept.dt_medicaltype = medtype.code and medtype.code_defdoclist = '010205' where adt.pk_pv = #{pkPv} and adt.flag_admit = '0' order by date_begin

select diag.sort_no seq_no, diag.dt_diagtype dt_diag_type, diag.code_icd diag_code, diag.name_diag diag_name, diag.desc_diag diag_desc, diag.eu_admcon admit_cond_code, diag.flag_maj flag_primary, diag.code_dcdt code_dcdt, diag.desc_bodypart desc_bodypart, diag.desc_drgprop desc_drgprop, diag.flag_cure flag_cure from pv_diag diag where diag.pk_pv = #{pkPv} and diag.dt_diagtype = '0109' and diag.del_flag = '0' order by flag_maj desc,sort_no asc

select '0' eu_type, icd9.diagcode op_code, op.desc_op op_name, op.date_begin op_date, opl.ba_code grade_code, opl.name grade_name, op.pk_emp_phy_op pk_emp_op, op.name_emp_phy_op op_doc_name, op.pk_emp_asis pk_emp_opi, op.name_emp_asis opi_name, op.pk_emp_asis2 pk_emp_opii, op.name_emp_asis2 opii_name, inc.ba_code incision_type_code, inc.name incision_type_name, hea.ba_code heal_garde_code, hea.name heal_grade_name, ane.ba_code anes_type_code, ane.name anes_type_name, op.pk_emp_anae pk_emp_anes, op.name_emp_anae anes_doc_name, case when op.eu_optype='1' then '1' else '0' end flag_elective from ex_op_occ op inner join bd_term_diag icd9 on op.pk_op=icd9.pk_diag inner join bd_defdoc opl on op.dt_oplevel=opl.code and opl.code_defdoclist='030305' inner join bd_defdoc inc on op.dt_oplevel=inc.code and inc.code_defdoclist='030303' inner join bd_defdoc hea on op.dt_oplevel=hea.code and hea.code_defdoclist='030306' inner join bd_defdoc ane on op.dt_anae=ane.code and ane.code_defdoclist='030300' where op.pk_pv=#{pkPv} and op.del_flag='0'

select sum(cg.amount) item_amount, case when cg.flag_pd = '1' then pct.code else ict.code end item_code, case when cg.flag_pd = '1' then pct.name else ict.name end item_name from bl_ip_dt cg left outer join bd_pd pd on cg.pk_item = pd.pk_pd and cg.flag_pd = '1' left outer join bd_defdoc pct on pd.dt_chcate = pct.code and pct.code_defdoclist = '030800' left outer join bd_item item on cg.pk_item = item.pk_item and cg.flag_pd = '0' left outer join bd_defdoc ict on item.dt_chcate = ict.code and ict.code_defdoclist = '030800' where cg.pk_pv = #{pkPv} group by case when cg.flag_pd = '1' then pct.code else ict.code end, case when cg.flag_pd = '1' then pct.name else ict.name end order by case when cg.flag_pd = '1' then pct.code else ict.code end
select * from emr_home_page_trans adt where adt.pk_page= #{pkPage} and adt.flag_icu='1'

select cchi.sortno, cchi.code_cchi, cchi.name_cchi, cchi.desc_cchi, emp.code_emp, cchi.name_emp_entry, dept.code_dept, dept.name_dept, cchi.flag_maj from cn_cchi cchi inner join bd_ou_employee emp on cchi.pk_emp_entry=emp.PK_EMP inner join bd_ou_dept dept on cchi.pk_dept=dept.pk_dept where cchi.pk_pv= #{pkPv} and cchi.FLAG_DEL='0' order by cchi.sortno
mapper.update: update pv_ip set eu_status_doc='0', date_commit_doc = #{date} where pk_pv = #{pkPv} and (eu_status_doc in('-2','-1') or eu_status_doc is null)
update pv_ip set eu_status_doc='-1', date_commit_doc=null where pk_pv= #{pkPv} and eu_status_doc='0'
mapper.select: select trans.pk_trans, trans.seq_no, trans.pk_dept, trans.dept_code, trans.dept_name, trans.trans_date from emr_home_page_trans trans where trans.pk_page=#{pkPage} and trans.del_flag='0'
select * from emr_home_page_diags diag where diag.pk_page=#{pkPage} and diag.del_flag='0'
mapper.update:
UPDATE EMR_HOME_PAGE SET
PK_ORG = #{emrHomePage.pkOrg},
PK_PI = #{emrHomePage.pkPi},
TIMES = #{emrHomePage.times,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PK_PV = #{emrHomePage.pkPv},
MED_ORG_CODE = #{emrHomePage.medOrgCode},
MED_ORG_NAME = #{emrHomePage.medOrgName},
MED_PAY_MODE = #{emrHomePage.medPayMode},
PAT_NO = #{emrHomePage.patNo},
NAME = #{emrHomePage.name},
DT_SEX = #{emrHomePage.dtSex},
BIRTH_DATE = #{emrHomePage.birthDate},
AGE_YEAR = #{emrHomePage.ageYear},
AGE_TXT = #{emrHomePage.ageTxt},
COUNTRY_CODE = #{emrHomePage.countryCode},
COUNTRY_NAME = #{emrHomePage.countryName},
NATION_CODE = #{emrHomePage.nationCode},
NATION_NAME = #{emrHomePage.nationName},
MARRY_CODE = #{emrHomePage.marryCode},
RESIDE_ADDR = #{emrHomePage.resideAddr},
RESIDE_ADDR_CODE = #{emrHomePage.resideAddrCode},
ADMIT_PATH_CODE = #{emrHomePage.admitPathCode},
ADMIT_TIME = #{emrHomePage.admitTime},
PK_ADMIT_DEPT = #{emrHomePage.pkAdmitDept},
ADMIT_DEPT_NAME = #{emrHomePage.admitDeptName},
ADMIT_WARD_NAME = #{emrHomePage.admitWardName},
DIS_TIME = #{emrHomePage.disTime},
PK_DEPT_DIS = #{emrHomePage.pkDeptDis},
DIS_DEPT_NAME = #{emrHomePage.disDeptName},
PK_WARD_DIS = #{emrHomePage.pkWardDis},
DIS_WARD_NAME = #{emrHomePage.disWardName},
IN_HOS_DAYS = #{emrHomePage.inHosDays},
PK_EMP_CLINIC = #{emrHomePage.pkEmpClinic},
MED_REC_TYPE = #{emrHomePage.medRecType},
FLAG_CP = #{emrHomePage.flagCp},
NUM_RES = #{emrHomePage.numRes},
NUM_SUCC = #{emrHomePage.numSucc},
FLAG_DRUG_ALLERGY = #{emrHomePage.flagDrugAllergy},
FLAG_AUTOPSY = #{emrHomePage.flagAutopsy},
BLOOD_CODE_ABO = #{emrHomePage.bloodCodeAbo},
BLOOD_CODE_RH = #{emrHomePage.bloodCodeRh},
BLOOD_NAME_RH = #{emrHomePage.bloodNameRh},
PK_EMP_CHIEF = #{emrHomePage.pkEmpChief},
CHIEF_NAME = #{emrHomePage.chiefName},
PK_EMP_CONSULT = #{emrHomePage.pkEmpConsult},
CONSULT_NAME = #{emrHomePage.consultName},
PK_EMP_REFER = #{emrHomePage.pkEmpRefer},
REFER_NAME = #{emrHomePage.referName},
PK_EMP_NURSE = #{emrHomePage.pkEmpNurse},
NURSE_NAME = #{emrHomePage.nurseName},
LEAVE_HOS_CODE = #{emrHomePage.leaveHosCode},
RECEIVE_ORG_NAME = #{emrHomePage.receiveOrgName},
FLAG_READMIT = #{emrHomePage.flagReadmit},
COMA_DAY_BEF = #{emrHomePage.comaDayBef},
BIRTH_ADDR_PROV = #{emrHomePage.birthAddrProv},
BIRTH_ADDR_CITY = #{emrHomePage.birthAddrCity},
BIRTH_ADDR_COUNTY = #{emrHomePage.birthAddrCounty},
ORIGIN_ADDR_PROV = #{emrHomePage.originAddrProv},
ORIGIN_ADDR_CITY = #{emrHomePage.originAddrCity},
CURR_ADDR_PROV = #{emrHomePage.currAddrProv},
CURR_ADDR_CITY = #{emrHomePage.currAddrCity},
CURR_ADDR_COUNTY = #{emrHomePage.currAddrCounty},
RESIDE_ADDR_PROV = #{emrHomePage.resideAddrProv},
RESIDE_ADDR_CITY = #{emrHomePage.resideAddrCity},
RESIDE_ADDR_COUNTY = #{emrHomePage.resideAddrCounty},
PK_ADMIT_WARD = #{emrHomePage.pkAdmitWard},
CURR_ADDR_CODE = #{emrHomePage.currAddrCode},
DEL_FLAG = '0' WHERE PK_PAGE = #{emrHomePage.pkPage}

UPDATE EMR_HOME_PAGE_TRANS SET
PK_ORG = #{emrHomePageTrans.pkOrg},
PK_PAGE = #{emrHomePageTrans.pkPage},
PK_DEPT = #{emrHomePageTrans.pkDept},
DEPT_CODE = #{emrHomePageTrans.deptCode},
DEPT_NAME = #{emrHomePageTrans.deptName},
TRANS_DATE = #{emrHomePageTrans.transDate},
DEL_FLAG = '0'
WHERE PK_TRANS = #{emrHomePageTrans.pkTrans}

UPDATE EMR_HOME_PAGE_DIAGS SET
PK_ORG = #{emrHomePageDiags.pkOrg},
PK_PAGE = #{emrHomePageDiags.pkPage},
DT_DIAG_TYPE = #{emrHomePageDiags.dtDiagType},
DIAG_CODE = #{emrHomePageDiags.diagCode},
DIAG_NAME = #{emrHomePageDiags.diagName},
DIAG_DESC = #{emrHomePageDiags.diagDesc},
ADMIT_COND_CODE = #{emrHomePageDiags.admitCondCode},
ADMIT_COND_NAME = #{emrHomePageDiags.admitCondName},
FLAG_PRIMARY = #{emrHomePageDiags.flagPrimary},
FLAG_PRIMARY = #{emrHomePageDiags.flagPrimary}
DEL_FLAG = '0' WHERE PK_PAGEDIAG = #{emrHomePageDiags.pkPagediag}

UPDATE EMR_HOME_PAGE_OPS
SET
PK_ORG = #{emrHomePageOps.pkOrg},
PK_PAGE = #{emrHomePageOps.pkPage},
OP_CODE = #{emrHomePageOps.opCode},
OP_NAME = #{emrHomePageOps.opName},
OP_DATE = #{emrHomePageOps.opDate},
GRADE_CODE = #{emrHomePageOps.gradeCode},
GRADE_NAME = #{emrHomePageOps.gradeName},
PK_EMP_OP = #{emrHomePageOps.pkEmpOp},
OP_DOC_NAME = #{emrHomePageOps.opDocName},
PK_EMP_OPI = #{emrHomePageOps.pkEmpOpi},
OPI_NAME = #{emrHomePageOps.opiName},
PK_EMP_OPII = #{emrHomePageOps.pkEmpOpii},
OPII_NAME = #{emrHomePageOps.opiiName},
INCISION_TYPE_CODE = #{emrHomePageOps.incisionTypeCode},
INCISION_TYPE_NAME = #{emrHomePageOps.incisionTypeName},
HEAL_GRADE_CODE = #{emrHomePageOps.healGradeCode},
HEAL_GRADE_NAME = #{emrHomePageOps.healGradeName},
ANES_TYPE_CODE = #{emrHomePageOps.anesTypeCode},
ANES_TYPE_NAME = #{emrHomePageOps.anesTypeName},
PK_EMP_ANES = #{emrHomePageOps.pkEmpAnes},
ANES_DOC_NAME = #{emrHomePageOps.anesDocName},
DEL_FLAG = '0' WHERE PK_OPS = #{emrHomePageOps.pkOps}

UPDATE EMR_HOME_PAGE_CHARGES
SET
PK_ORG = #{emrHomePageCharges.pkOrg},
PK_PAGE = #{emrHomePageCharges.pkPage},
ITEM_CODE = #{emrHomePageCharges.itemCode},
ITEM_NAME = #{emrHomePageCharges.itemName},
ITEM_AMOUNT = #{emrHomePageCharges.itemAmount},
DEL_FLAG = '0' WHERE PK_CHARGE = #{emrHomePageCharges.pkCharge}

UPDATE EMR_HOME_PAGE_BR SET
PK_ORG = #{emrHomePageBr.pkOrg},
PK_PAGE = #{emrHomePageBr.pkPage},
DT_SEX = #{emrHomePageBr.dtSex},
CODE_CB = #{emrHomePageBr.codeCb},
NAME_CB = #{emrHomePageBr.nameCb},
WEIGHT = #{emrHomePageBr.weight},
CODE_OC = #{emrHomePageBr.codeOc},
NAME_OC = #{emrHomePageBr.nameOc},
CODE_BREATH = #{emrHomePageBr.codeBreath},
NAME_BREATH = #{emrHomePageBr.nameBreath},
NUM_RES = #{emrHomePageBr.numRes},
NUM_SUCC = #{emrHomePageBr.numSucc},
NUM_SUCC = #{emrHomePageBr.numSucc},
DEL_FLAG = '0'
WHERE PK_BR = #{emrHomePageBr.pkBr}

UPDATE EMR_HOME_PAGE_OR SET
PK_ORG = #{emrHomePageOr.pkOrg},
PK_PAGE = #{emrHomePageOr.pkPage},
STAGE_TYPE_CODE = #{emrHomePageOr.stageTypeCode},
STAGE_TYPE_NAME = #{emrHomePageOr.stageTypeName},
STAGE_T = #{emrHomePageOr.stageT},
STAGE_N = #{emrHomePageOr.stageN},
STAGE_M = #{emrHomePageOr.stageM},
STAGE_CODE = #{emrHomePageOr.stageCode},
STAGE_NAME = #{emrHomePageOr.stageName},
RADIOTH_MODE_CODE = #{emrHomePageOr.radiothModeCode},
RADIOTH_MODE_NAME = #{emrHomePageOr.radiothModeName},
RADIOTH_PROGR_CODE = #{emrHomePageOr.radiothProgrCode},
RADIOTH_PROGR_NAME = #{emrHomePageOr.radiothProgrName},
RADIOTH_DEVICE_CODE = #{emrHomePageOr.radiothDeviceCode},
RADIOTH_DEVICE_NAME = #{emrHomePageOr.radiothDeviceName},
PRI_DOSE = #{emrHomePageOr.priDose},
PRI_TIMES = #{emrHomePageOr.priTimes},
PRI_DAYS = #{emrHomePageOr.priDays},
PRI_DATE_BEGIN = #{emrHomePageOr.priDateBegin},
PRI_DATE_END = #{emrHomePageOr.priDateEnd},
LYM_DOSE = #{emrHomePageOr.lymDose},
LYM_TIMES = #{emrHomePageOr.lymTimes},
LYM_DAYS = #{emrHomePageOr.lymDays},
LYM_DATE_BEGIN = #{emrHomePageOr.lymDateBegin},
LYM_DATE_END = #{emrHomePageOr.lymDateEnd},
MET_NAME = #{emrHomePageOr.metName},
MET_DOSE = #{emrHomePageOr.metDose},
MET_TIMES = #{emrHomePageOr.metTimes},
MET_DAYS = #{emrHomePageOr.metDays},
MET_DATE_BEGIN = #{emrHomePageOr.metDateBegin},
MET_DATE_END = #{emrHomePageOr.metDateEnd},
CHEM_MODE_CODE = #{emrHomePageOr.chemModeCode},
CHEM_MODE_NAME = #{emrHomePageOr.chemModeName},
CHEM_METHOD_CODE = #{emrHomePageOr.chemMethodCode},
CHEM_METHOD_NAME = #{emrHomePageOr.chemMethodName},
DEL_FLAG = '0'
WHERE PK_PAGEOR = #{emrHomePageOr.pkPageor}

UPDATE NHIS.EMR_HOME_PAGE_OR_DT SET
PK_ORG = #{emrHomePageOrDt.pkOrg},
PK_PAGEOR = #{emrHomePageOrDt.pkPageor},
BEGIN_DATE = #{emrHomePageOrDt.beginDate},
END_DATE = #{emrHomePageOrDt.endDate},
DRUG_NAME = #{emrHomePageOrDt.drugName},
COURSE_CODE = #{emrHomePageOrDt.courseCode},
COURSE_NAME = #{emrHomePageOrDt.courseName},
EFFECT_CODE = #{emrHomePageOrDt.effectCode},
EFFECT_NAME = #{emrHomePageOrDt.effectName},
EFFECT_NAME = #{emrHomePageOrDt.effectName},
DEL_FLAG = '0'
WHERE PK_ORDT = #{emrHomePageOrDt.PK_ORDT}
mapper.insert: insert into EMR_HOME_PAGE (PK_PAGE, PK_ORG, PK_PI, TIMES, PK_PV, MED_ORG_CODE, MED_ORG_NAME, HEALTH_CARD_NO, MED_PAY_MODE, PAT_NO, "NAME", DT_SEX, BIRTH_DATE, AGE_YEAR, AGE_MONTH, AGE_TXT, NEWBORN_WEIGHT, NEWBORN_IN_WEIGHT, BIRTH_ADDR_PROV, BIRTH_ADDR_CITY, BIRTH_ADDR_COUNTY, ORIGIN_ADDR_PROV, ORIGIN_ADDR_CITY, COUNTRY_CODE, COUNTRY_NAME, NATION_CODE, NATION_NAME, ID_TYPE, ID_NO, OCCUP_CODE, OCCUP_NAME, MARRY_CODE, MARRY_NAME, CURR_ADDR_PROV, CURR_ADDR_CITY, CURR_ADDR_COUNTY, CURR_PHONE, CURR_ZIP_CODE, WORK_UNIT, WORK_UNIT_PHONE, RESIDE_ADDR_PROV, RESIDE_ADDR_CITY, RESIDE_ADDR_COUNTY, RESIDE_ZIP_CODE, WORK_UNIT_ZIP_CODE, CONTACT_NAME, CONTACT_RELAT_CODE, CONTACT_RELAT_NAME, CONTACT_ADDR, CONTACT_PHONE, ADMIT_PATH_CODE, ADMIT_PATH_NAME, ADMIT_TIME, PK_ADMIT_DEPT, ADMIT_DEPT_NAME, ADMIT_WARD_NAME, TRANS_DEPT_NAMES, DIS_TIME, PK_DEPT_DIS, DIS_DEPT_NAME, PK_WARD_DIS, DIS_WARD_NAME, PK_DIAG_CLINIC, IN_HOS_DAYS, DIAG_CODE_CLINIC, PK_DIAG_DIS, DIAG_NAME_CLINIC, DIAG_CODE_DIS, PK_DIAG_EXTC_IP, DIAG_NAME_DIS, MED_REC_TYPE, FLAG_CP, NUM_RES, NUM_SUCC, DIAG_CODE_EXTC_IP, PK_DIAG_PATHO, DIAG_NAME_EXTC_IP, DIAG_CODE_PATHO, DIAG_NAME_PATHO, PATHO_NO, FLAG_DRUG_ALLERGY, ALLERGIC_DRUG, FLAG_AUTOPSY, BLOOD_CODE_ABO, BLOOD_NAME_ABO, BLOOD_CODE_RH, BLOOD_NAME_RH, PK_EMP_DIRECTOR, DIRECTOR_NAME, PK_EMP_CONSULT, CONSULT_NAME, PK_EMP_REFER, REFER_NAME, #{diagCodePathoIcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{diagNamePathoIcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pathoNoIcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{flagDrugAllergyIcd,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{allergicDrugIcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{partDisease,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{patSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{codeDcdtClinic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{descBodypart,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{descDrgprop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{descDiag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{daysGdi,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{daysGdii,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{daysGdiii,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{daysGds,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{hoursGds,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{hoursBm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{minutesBm,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{valAdlin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{valAdlout,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{dtDrgcasetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{currAddrIcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{birthAddrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{originAddrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{currAddrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{resideAddrCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: select sum(cg.quan) quan, cg.name_cg, parm.code from bl_ip_dt cg inner join bd_ord_item oi on cg.pk_item=oi.pk_item inner join bd_ord ord on oi.pk_ord=ord.pk_ord inner join bd_sysparam parm on ord.code=parm.val and parm.code in ('EX0010','EX0011','EX0012','EX0013') where cg.pk_pv=#{pkPv} group by cg.name_cg, parm.code

select sum(cg.quan) quan from bl_ip_dt cg inner join bd_item item on cg.pk_item=item.pk_item inner join bd_dictattr att on item.pk_item=att.pk_dict and att.code_attr='0110' and val_attr='1' where cg.pk_pv=#{pkPv}
select rec.eu_qctype, rec.date_qc, rec.name_emp_qc, rec.eu_result from qc_ehp_rec rec Inner Join qc_ehp ehp On rec.pk_qcehp=ehp.pk_qcehp where ehp.pk_pv=#{pkPv}
select dt.dt_ehpitem, dt.name_item, dt.desc_defect, dt.eu_status from qc_ehp_detail dt Inner Join qc_ehp ehp On dt.pk_qcehp=ehp.pk_qcehp where ehp.pk_pv=#{pkPv} and dt.eu_type='0'
